title: Children's English
description: Engaging lessons designed for children aged 7-12, focusing on vocabulary, grammar, and conversation skills through games, songs, and interactive activities.

title: Business English
description: Specialized lessons focused on professional communication, including presentations, negotiations, email writing, and business vocabulary relevant to your field.

title: Exam Preparation (UGE, TOEFL, etc.)
description: Targeted preparation for exams like UGE, TOEFL, IELTS, Cambridge exams, and others, using practice tests and providing specific feedback based on my experience.

title: Conversation Practice
description: Focused sessions designed to improve your speaking fluency, pronunciation, and build confidence in real-world conversations on topics that interest you.
